en: Cardano's focus on Sustainability refers to projects that are addressing issues of world hunger.
sw: Mtazamo wa Cardano juu ya Uendelevu unarejelea miradi ambayo inashughulikia maswala ya njaa ulimwenguni.

en: Sustainability refers to the need to pay employees of the founding organization a competitive wage in order to retain talent.
sw: Uendelevu unarejelea hitaji la kulipa wafanyikazi wa shirika mwanzilishi mshahara wa ushindani ili kuhifadhi talanta.

en: Sustainability is the plan and ability of a project to make decisions about what work to do, and pay for that work
sw: Uendelevu ni mpango na uwezo wa mradi kufanya maamuzi kuhusu kazi gani ya kufanya, na kulipia kazi hiyo

en: Sustainability here refers to being eco-consious. Cardano's Proof-of-Stake protocol means that the network has a lean carbon footprint and is very earth friendly.
sw: Uendelevu hapa unarejelea kuwa na uzingatiaji wa mazingira. Itifaki ya Uthibitisho-wa-hisa ya Cardano inamaanisha kuwa mtandao una alama ya chini ya kaboni na haileti madhara duniani.  .

en: Cheaper transaction fees
sw: Ada nafuu zaidi za ununuzi

en: DEXes were built to improve the customer service experience for end users.
sw: DEX ziliundwa ili kuboresha hali ya huduma kwa wateja kwa watumiaji.

en: Usually more beginner friendly
sw: Kawaida zaidi ni ya kirafiki kwa watumiaji wa mara ya kwanza

en: They are the cheapest way to exchange fiat money (ie dollars or euros) for cryptos.
sw: Ndio njia ya bei rahisi zaidi ya kubadilisha fedha za fiat (yaani dola au euro) kwa cryptos.

en: Cost savings
sw: Akiba ya gharama

en: Transparency & Decentralization
sw: Uwazi na Ugatuaji

en: Automated business decision
sw: Uamuzi wa kiotomatiki wa biashara

en: Faster transactions
sw: Shughuli za haraka zaidi

en: Blockchain is great at recording TRANSACTIONS
sw: Blockchain ni bora katika kurekodi SHUGHULI

en: Blockchain can solve most problems related to MONEY
sw: Blockchain inaweza kutatua matatizo mengi yanayohusiana na PESA

en: Blockchain can store unprecedented amounts of DATA
sw: Blockchain inaweza kuhifadhi kiasi ambacho hakiwezi linganishwa cha DATA

en: Blockchain is revolutionizing SOCIAL NETWORKS
sw: Blockchain inaleta mapinduzi katika MITANDAO YA KIJAMII

en: Cardano is built to scale easily as the user base grow.
sw: Cardano imeundwa ili iboreke kiurahisi kadri msingi wa watumiaji unavyokua.

en: Cardano DApps are generally cheaper ro build and deploy.
sw: Cardano DApps kwa ujumla ni nafuu kujenga na kutumia.

en: Cardano Smart Contracts use Haskell programming language.
sw: Mikataba bora ya Cardano hutumia lugha ya programu ya Haskell.

en: The cost of a transaction on a Cardano DApp can be known ahead of time.
sw: Gharama ya shughuli kwenye Cardano DApp inaweza kujulikana kabla ya shughuli hiyo kufanyika.

en: A new way of organizing work and power using blockchain.
sw: Njia mpya ya kupanga kazi na nguvu kwa kutumia blockchain.

en: A group of people who are all invested in the same blockchain.
sw: Kundi la watu ambao wote wamewekeza katika blockchain sawa.

en: DAO stands for ?Decentralization And Optimization?, describing the goal of every blockchain.
sw: DAO inasimamia "Ugatuaji na Uboreshaji", ikielezea lengo la kila blockchain.

en: An index that lists the daily prices of different crypto currencies.
sw: Kielezo inayoorodhesha bei za kila siku za sarafu tofauti za crypto.

en: Minting NFTs in lieu of wedding bands to celebrate a marriage.
sw: Kuunda NFTs badala ya bendi za harusi ili kusherehekea ndoa.

en: Using blockchain to track food provenance.
sw: Kutumia blockchain kufuatilia asili ya chakula.

en: Enabling musicians and artists to earn royalties on the resale value of their work.
sw: Kuwawezesha wanamuziki na wasanii kupata mrabaha kwa thamani ya mauzo ya kazi zao.

en: Storing large files in the cloud, to save space on personal devices.
sw: Kuhifadhi faili kubwa kwenye wingu, ili kuhifadhi nafasi kwenye vifaa vya kibinafsi.

en: Speed
sw: Kasi

en: Profitability
sw: Faida

en: Transparency
sw: Uwazi

en: Permissionless
sw: Isiyo na ruhusa

en: Definitely. DApps and Web3 are the future, so new apps should make the move now to save time and money later.
sw: Hakika. DApps na Web3 ni za siku zijazo, kwa hivyo programu mpya zinapaswa kuchukua hatua sasa ili kuokoa muda na pesa baadaye.

en: No. DApps are too early in development, and the downsides clearly outweigh the benefits.
sw: Hapana. DApps ni za mapema sana kutengenezwa, na hasara zake ni kubwa kuliko manufaa.

en: Maybe. If the app would be faster, cheaper to use, or more trustworthy by leveraging a blockchain, then a DApp is a good idea.
sw: Labda. Ikiwa programu hiyo itakuwa ya haraka, ya bei nafuu kutumia, au ya kuaminika zaidi kwa kutumia blockchain, basi DApp ni wazo nzuri.

en: Yes. DApps are a trending buzzword, so smart marketing dictates that all apps should be DApps.
sw: Ndio. DApps ni neno linalovuma, kwa hivyo uuzaji mahiri unaamuru kwamba programu zote ziwe DApps.

en: A mobile phone interface that allows secure phone calls anywhere in the world.
sw: Kiolesura cha simu ya mkononi kinachoruhusu upigaji simu salama mahali popote duniani.

en: A ?store? that sells NFTs.
sw: Duka" linalouza NFTs.

en: A game that allows users to move game assets onto a blockchain.
sw: Mchezo unaowaruhusu watumiaji kuhamisha vipengee vya mchezo kwenye blockchain.

en: A Decentralized Exchange that enables peer-to-peer financial transactions .
sw: Ubadilishanaji uliogatuliwa ambao huwezesha shughuli za kifedha kati ya marika .

en: By extending the familiar ?hierarchy of power? idea in new ways, thanks to blockchain.
sw: Kwa kupanua wazo linalojulikana la "idara ya madaraka" kwa njia mpya, kwa kutumia blockchain.

en: By allowing ideas to come from anyone, capturing votes indelibly on the blockchain, and enabling the  automatic execution of certain tasks.
sw: Kwa kuruhusu mawazo kutoka kwa mtu yeyote, kupiga kura bila kufutika kwenye blockchain, na kuwezesha utekelezaji wa moja kwa moja wa majukumu fulani.

en: By giving individual contributors a chance to make decisions, based on a randomization algorithm.
sw: Kwa kuwapa wachangiaji binafsi nafasi ya kufanya maamuzi, kulingana na kanuni za kubahatisha.

en: By making humans obsolete, so that all the work can be done by robots.
sw: Kwa kuwafanya wanadamu kuwa wa kizamani, ili kazi yote iweze kufanywa na roboti.

en: There are many blockchain scams one has to watch out for.
sw: Kuna kashfa nyingi za blockchain ambazo mtu anapaswa kujihadhari nazo.

en: Blockchain users generally should not be trusted.
sw: Watumiaji wa blockchain kwa ujumla hawapaswi kuaminiwa.

en: Blockchain technology is not trustworthy.
sw: Teknolojia ya blockchain sio ya kuaminika.

en: Trust is not needed when many unrelated nodes confirm the same version of the truth.
sw: Uaminifu hauhitajiki wakati nodi nyingi zisizohusiana zinathibitisha toleo lile lile la ukweli.

en: Security
sw: Usalama

en: Global scaling
sw: Upanuzi wa kimataifa

en: Fail Forward
sw: Kushindwa Mbele

en: Humanitarian values
sw: Maadili ya kibinadamu

en: Block production is not yet fully decentralized, but it?s on-track to get there.
sw: Uzalishaji wa vitalu bado haujagatuliwa kikamilifu, lakini uko njiani kufikia hapo.

en: Cardano is both a practical and thought leader on the topic of decentralization, and is actively working to decentralize all aspects of the ecosystem.
sw: Cardano ni kiongozi wa vitendo na anayefikiria juu ya mada ya ugatuaji wa madaraka, na anafanya kazi kikamilifu kugawa vipengele vyote vya mfumo ikolojia.

en: Cardano aims to have the most decentralized nodes in the world, but plans to keep maintenance and development of the technology in-house.
sw: Cardano inalenga kuwa na nodi nyingi zaidi duniani zilizogatuliwa, lakini inapanga kuweka matengenezo na maendeleo ya teknolojia iwe ya kati.

en: It has always been the most decentralized network in the world.
sw: Daima imekuwa mtandao wenye ugatuaji kubwa zaidi duniani.

en: Independently building a new Cardano Wallet aimed at users in Southeast Africa
sw: kujenga pochi mpya ya Cardano inayolenga watumiaji Kusini-mashariki mwa Afrika

en: Building DApps, DAOs, and DEXes
sw: Kujenga DApps, DAO, na DEXes

en: Creating and launching new NFT projects
sw: Kuunda na kuzindua miradi mipya ya NFT

en: Developer Mentorship, Translation, Research, Project Catalyst training
sw: Ushauri kwa Wasanidi Programu, Utafsiri, Utafiti, Mafunzo ya project catalyst

en: Onboarding, Funding, Reporting, Project Completion
sw: Kutambulisha, Ufadhili, Kuripoti, Kukamilisha Mradi

en: Ideation, Community Feedback, Governance
sw: Mawazo, Maoni ya Jamii, Utawala

en: Building, Deploying, Marketing
sw: Ujenzi, Usambazaji, Uuzaji

en: Proof of Life, Test Transactions, Challenge Teams
sw: Uthibitisho wa Maisha, Shughuli ya Majaribio, Timu za Changamoto

en: Impact, Feasibility, Auditability
sw: Athari, Uwezekano, Ukaguzi

en: Motivation, Budget, Roadmap
sw: Motisha, Bajeti, Ramani ya Njia

en: Challenge Metrics, Motivation & Values, Definition of Success
sw: Vipimo vya Changamoto, Motisha na Maadili, Ufafanuzi wa Mafanikio

en: Problem Statement, Solution Description, Relevant Experience
sw: Taarifa ya Tatizo, Maelezo ya Suluhisho, Uzoefu Husika

en: Since the campaigns are the same in every round, it's probably best to think of a different idea.
sw: Kwa kuwa kampeni ni sawa katika kila raundi, pengine ni bora kufikiria wazo tofauti.

en: Consider submitting your own Campaign idea for the next round.
sw: Fikiria kuwasilisha wazo lako la Kampeni kwa raundi inayofuata.

en: Just word your proposal to make it seem like it fits an existing campaign.
sw: Andika tu pendekezo lako ili kuifanya ionekane kuwa inafaa kampeni iliyopo.

en: A good strategy is to just put it in the campaign that seems the most popular in the ecosystem.
sw: Mkakati mzuri ni kuiweka tu katika kampeni inayoonekana kuwa maarufu zaidi katika mfumo wa ikolojia.

en: Using a self-custodial wallet is just as easy as an exchange once you just do it!
sw: Kutumia pochi lako ni rahisi kama ubadilishanaji mara tu unapoifanya!

en: Using a self-custodial wallet is important when you need to convert your ada to fiat currency (cash).
sw: Kutumia pochi lako ni muhimu unapohitaji kubadilisha ada yako kuwa sarafu ya kawaida

en: Using a self-custodial wallet is the only good way to participate in other parts of the ecosystem, like defi, buying NFTs, etc.
sw: Kutumia pochi lako ndiyo njia nzuri pekee  ya kushiriki katika sehemu nyingine za mfumo ikolojia, kama vile defi, kununua NFTs, n.k.

en: Using a self-custodial Cardano wallet and staking it supports decentralization and network security.
sw: Kutumia pochi yako ya Cardano ya kujihifadhi hisa  inasaidia ugatuaji na usalama wa mtandao.

en: Ada holders can earn remuneration for voting
sw: Wamiliki wa Ada wanaweza kupata malipo kwa kupiga kura

en: Staking your ada to a centralized Project Catalyst pool can earn ada rewards.
sw: Kuwekeza ada yako kwenye hifadhi ya hisa ya project catalyst iliyo ya kati unaweza kupata tuzo za ada.

en: Proposers who win votes and deliver on their projects earn ada
sw: Wapendekeza wanaoshinda kura na kutekeleza miradi yao hupata ada

en: Assessing Proposals during the assessment stage is a way to earn ada.
sw: Kutathmini Mapendekezo wakati wa kukaguliwa kwa mapendekezo ni njia ya kupata ada.

en: Insights
sw: Maarifa

en: Proposals
sw: Mapendekezo

en: Campaigns
sw: Kampeni

en: Assessments
sw: Tathmini

en: There's no such thing as bad press! Provocative tweets that stir up discussion are a great way to get attention for your project.
sw: Hakuna kitu kama vyombo vya habari vibaya! Twiti za uchochezi zinazochochea mjadala ni njia nzuri ya kupata umakini wa mradi wako.

en: Traditional advertising platforms like Google AdWords and email mailing lists should form the foundation of any marketing strategy.
sw: Mifumo ya kitamaduni ya utangazaji kama Google AdWords na orodha za barua pepe zinapaswa kuunda msingi wa mkakati wowote wa uuzaji.

en: Participate in community forums like Twitter to participate and learn about other people, projects, and group dynamics before you show up to advertise your project.
sw: Shiriki katika mijadala ya jamii kama Twitter ili kushiriki na kujifunza kuhusu watu wengine, miradi, na vikundi kabla hujajitokeza kutangaza mradi wako.

en: If your idea and proposal are good enough, marketing work isn't necessary.
sw: Ikiwa wazo na pendekezo lako ni nzuri sana, kazi ya uuzaji/utangazaji sio lazima

en: Voting, Staking, Governance
sw: Upigaji kura, uwekezaji hisa, Utawala

en: Anonymity, Sophistication, Transactions Per Second (TPS)
sw: Kutokujulikana, Umahiri, shughuli kwa Sekunde

en: Reduced network congestion, less failed transactions, smaller block size
sw: Kupunguza msongamano wa mtandao, kupunguza kufeli kwa miamala , saizi ndogo ya bloki

en: Speed, Convenience, and Cost Savings
sw: Kasi, Urahisi, na Uokoaji wa Gharama

en: Funded proposers get paid in ada and should not convert it to local fiat currency.
sw: Wapendekezaji wanaofadhiliwa hulipwa kwa ada na hawapaswi kuibadilisha kuwa sarafu ya kawaida

en: Funding is dependent on showing proof of your work, and the exact requirements for this may change as Project Catalyst evolves.
sw: Ufadhili unategemea kuonyesha uthibitisho wa kazi yako, na mahitaji halisi ya hili yanaweza kubadilika kadri project catalyst inavyoendelea kua.

en: While many elements of Project Catalyst change over time, payment terms always stay the same, so participants don't get confused.
sw: Ingawa vipengele vingi vya project catalyst hubadilika kadri muda unavyopita, masharti ya malipo huwa yale yale kila mara, ili washiriki wasichanganyikiwe.

en: Funded projects are paid in 6 equal monthly disbursements, as long as they complete their reports on time.
sw: Miradi inayofadhiliwa hulipwa kwa malipo 6 sawa ya kila mwezi, mradi tu wanakamilisha ripoti zao kwa wakati.

en: By offering end-to-end transparency, so that donors can see exactly how their money is used to support qualified students.
sw: Kwa kutoa uwazi kwa pande zote, ili wafadhili waweze kuona jinsi pesa zao zinavyotumika kusaidia wanafunzi waliohitimu.

en: By pledging to give all donated funding to students up front, which will magnify its impact.
sw: Kwa kuahidi kutoa ufadhili wote uliotolewa kwa wanafunzi mapema, ambayo itakuza ushawishi yake.

en: They are funded through Project Catalyst only, and won't need individual donors.
sw: Wanafadhiliwa kupitia Project Catalyst pekee, na hawatahitaji wafadhili binafsi.

en: By giving donors NFTs, which may appreciate in value.
sw: Kwa kuwapa wafadhili NFTs, ambazo zinaweza kupanda kwa bei

en: Because the founder, Charles Hoskinson, also helped found Ethereum, so we know Cardano will be a success.
sw: Kwa sababu mwanzilishi, Charles Hoskinson, pia alisaidia kuanzilishwa kwa Ethereum, kwa hiyo tunajua Cardano itafanikiwa.

en: Because it's price is relatively low right now, but it has high potential for the future.
sw: Kwa sababu bei yake ni ya chini kwa sasa, lakini ina uwezo mkubwa kwa siku zijazo.

en: Because it is well-researched at every step, and is being built for the long-haul, with quality and good values in mind.
sw: Kwa sababu kila hatua imechunguzwa vizuri, na inajengwa kuwa ya muda mrefu, kwa kuzingatia ubora na maadili mazuri.

en: Because we wanted to run a staking pool, and Cardano is the only blockchain that has that option so far.
sw: Kwa sababu tulitaka kuendesha hifadhi ya hisa, na Cardano ndiyo blockchain pekee ambayo ina chaguo hilo hadi sasa.

en: So that you have time to get comments from the community, and make updates to your proposal based on good feedback.
sw: Ili uwe na muda wa kupata maoni kutoka kwa jamii, na usasishe pendekezo lako kulingana na maoni mazuri.

en: Because Assessments will be given on a first-come-first-served bases, and early proposals usually score higher.
sw: Kwa sababu Tathmini itatolewa kwa misingi ya anayekuja wa kwanza, na mapendekezo ya mapema huwa yanapata ukadiriaji wa juu zaidi.

en: So that you can get a head start on building your proposed solution.
sw: Ili uweze kupata ishara ya kuanza kuunda suluhisho lako lililopendekezwa.

en: Because you need ample time to spread the word and market your proposal.
sw: Kwa sababu unahitaji muda wa kutosha kueneza neno na kutangaza pendekezo lako.

en: Your voting power is based on the average amount of ada that you usually have in your wallet.
sw: Uwezo wako wa kupiga kura unatokana na kiwango cha wastani cha ada ambacho huwa ukonacho kwenye pochi yako.

en: You must hold a minimum amount of ada and register your wallet by the deadline in order to vote.
sw: Lazima ushikilie kiwango flani cha chini cha ada na uandikishe pochi yako kufikia tarehe ya mwisho ili uweze kupiga kura.

en: Anyone who has any amount of ada can vote; just log in with your wallet when voting starts.
sw: Yeyote aliye na kiasi chochote cha ada anaweza kupiga kura; ingia tu na pochi yako wakati upigaji kura unapoanza.

en: Voting is the only role in Project Catalyst that does not get paid for participating.
sw: Upigaji kura ndio jukumu pekee katika project catalyst ambalo halilipwi kwa kushiriki.

en: It means that about 14M ada was delegated to the LIDO pool, which got our pool to start minting blocks and earning rewards for our delegators every epoch.
sw: Ina maana kwamba takriban ada 14M  zilikabidhiwa kwa hifadhi ya hisa ya LIDO, ambayo ilifanya hifadhi yetu ya hisa kuanza kutengeneza bloki na kupata tuzo kwa wawakilishi wetu kila wakati.

en: It means that all of our rewards for minting blocks now goes to the Cardano Foundation.
sw: Inamaanisha kuwa tuzo zetu zote za kutengeneza bloki sasa zinakwenda kwa Cardano Foundation.

en: It means that we will get to keep the delegation for at least a year or two.
sw: Ina maana kwamba tutaweza kuwawakilishi kwa angalau mwaka mmoja au miwili.

en: It means Lido Nation received 14M as a loan to start building our business.
sw: Ina maana Lido Nation ilipokea 14M kama mkopo ili kuanza kujenga biashara yetu.

en: A staking pool is basically a marketing arm for Cardano.
sw: hifadhi ya hisa ni idara ya kuuza ya cardano

en: Performing the functions of a computing node on the Cardano network.
sw: Kufanya kazi ya kuhesabu nodi kwenye mtandao wa Cardano.

en: Stake pools are the community groups that implement Cardano's "Humanitarian Values".
sw: Hifadhi ya hisa ni vikundi vya jamii vinavyotekeleza "Maadili ya Kibinadamu" ya Cardano.

en: Stake Pools each hold a portion of the central treasury and secure it.
sw: kila hifadhi ya hisa hushikilia sehemu ya hazina kuu na kuilinda.

en: Because they had to sell existing assets in order to add Cardano to their portfolio.
sw: Kwa sababu walilazimika kuuza mali zilizopo ili kuongeza Cardano kwenye umiliki wao.

en: Because it shows that Cardano is being recognized as a worthwhile and possibly valuable investment by smart people in the finance world.
sw: Kwa sababu inaonyesha kwamba Cardano inatambuliwa kama uwekezaji unaofaa na yenye thamani na watu wenye ujuzi katika ulimwengu wa fedha.

en: Because it's the only altcoin that has ever been added to a traditional investing portfolio.
sw: Kwa sababu ni altcoin pekee ambayo imewahi kuongezwa kwa umiliki ya jadi ya uwekezaji.

en: Because it probably means the value of Cardano (ada) will go up a lot.
sw: Kwa sababu labda inamaanisha thamani ya Cardano (ada) itapanda sana.

en: Making sure all the parts of Project Catalyst conform to industry best practices.
sw: Kuhakikisha kuwa sehemu zote za project catalyst zinazingatia mbinu bora za tasnia.

en: Following up on funded projects to make sure work is completed and community funds are used as promised.
sw: Kufuatilia miradi iliyofadhiliwa ili kuhakikisha kuwa kazi imekamilika na fedha za jamii zinatumika kama ilivyoahidiwa.

en: Auditors track the money being spent on funded projects and how it relates to the volatile exchange rate for ada.
sw: Wakaguzi hufuatilia pesa zinazotumika kwa miradi inayofadhiliwa na jinsi inavyohusiana na kiwango cha ubadilishaji cha ada.

en: Making sure that voting results are tallied fairly and accurately.
sw: Kuhakikisha kuwa matokeo ya upigaji kura yamehesabiwa kwa haki na kwa usahihi.

en: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cardano
sw: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cardano

en: Philosophy, Proof-of-Concept, Vision
sw: Falsafa, Uthibitisho-wa-Dhana, Maono

en: Ethereum, Solana, Cardano
sw: Ethereum, Solana, Cardano

en: Scalability, Interoperability, Sustainability
sw: uwezo wa kuboreshwa, ushirikiano,  uendelevu

en: Because DeFi is appealing to people who already work in an informal economy.
sw: Kwa sababu DeFi inawavutia watu ambao tayari wanafanya kazi katika uchumi usio rasmi.

en: Because so many people live in slums.
sw: Kwa sababu watu wengi wanaishi katika makazi duni.

en: Because Traditional Finance is dying out.
sw: Kwa sababu Fedha za Jadi zififia

en: Because "traditional" financial tools are scarce, but people do have access to digital technology.
sw: Kwa sababu zana za kifedha za "jadi" ni chache, lakini watu wanaweza kufikia teknolojia ya kidijitali

en: It's considered unethical to do outside research; voting choices should be made based on the content of each unique proposal.
sw: Inachukuliwa kuwa haina maadili kufanya utafiti wa nje; uchaguzi wa kupiga kura unapaswa kufanywa kulingana na maudhui ya kipekee ya kila pendekezo.

en: You can vote for as many projects as you want, each time using the full power of the ada in your wallet.
sw: Unaweza kupigia kura miradi mingi unavyotaka, kila wakati ukitumia nguvu kamili ya ada kwenye pochi yako.

en: If you use Lido Nation's Catalyst Explorer tool, we will submit your vote for you.
sw: Ukitumia zana ya Lido Nation's Catalyst Explorer, tutawasilisha kura yako kwa niaba yako.

en: It may be strategic to only vote for one project (your favorite) so your vote doesn't get diluted.
sw: Inaweza kuwa kimkakati kupigia kura mradi mmoja tu (unaopenda zaidi) ili kura yako isipunguzwe.

en: Light wallets store a copy of the whole blockchain on your local device.
sw: Pochi ya light (light wallet) huhifadhi nakala ya blockchain nzima kwenye kifaa chako.

en: Hosted wallets are the safest choice for most people.
sw: hosted wallets ni chaguo salama zaidi kwa watu wengi.

en: Wallets don't really hold your money; they are more like a "window" to look at the blockchain and see your holdings on it.
sw: Pochi haziweki pesa zako; wao ni kama "dirisha" kutazama blockchain na kuona umiliki kupitia pochi.

en: Despite their differences, it doesn't matter what kind of wallet you use.
sw: Licha ya tofauti zao, haijalishi ni aina gani ya pochi unayotumia.

en: They released them in their private pond
sw: Waliwaweka kwenye bwawa lao la kibinafsi

en: They kept them as pets
sw: Waliwaweka kama samaki wao wa kufugwa

en: They sold them to local sushi shops
sw: Waliziuza kwa maduka ya Sushi ya mtaa

en: They released them back into the water
sw: Waliwarudisha tena ndani ya maji

en: He's a professional athlete and boat captain.
sw: Yeye ni mwanariadha wa kitaaluma na nahodha wa mashua.

en: He's a software engineer and a sous chef.
sw: Yeye ni mhandisi wa programu na mpishi msaidizi.

en: He's a politician and bitcoin creator.
sw: Yeye ni mwanasiasa na muundaji wa bitcoin.

en: He's an evironmental artist and a co-host.
sw: Yeye ni mwanaharakati wa mazingira na mwenyeji mtangazaji msaidizi.

en: It allows the company to erase or rewrite information on the public blockchain
sw: Inaruhusu kampuni kufuta au kuandika upya habari kwenye blockchain ya umma

en: It allows the company to keep all information private
sw: Inaruhusu kampuni kuweka maelezo yote ya faragha

en: It allows the company to choose what information to share publicly
sw: Inaruhusu kampuni kuchagua ni maelezo gani ya kushiriki hadharani

en: It allows the company to store all information on the public blockchain
sw: Inaruhusu kampuni kuhifadhi habari zote kwenye blockchain ya umma

en: is a tool for organizing necklaces with square-shaped links

en: He is more focused on building a team of equals rather than leading from a position of authority.

en: He is more autocratic and directive, and expects strict adherence to rules and regulations.

en: He is more concerned with his own personal goals and ambitions than the goals and objectives of his team.
sw: Anajali zaidi malengo na matamanio yake binafsi kuliko malengo ya timu yake.

en: He is more likely to delegate tasks and responsibilities to others rather than taking charge himself.
sw: Ana uwezekano mkubwa wa kukabidhi kazi na majukumu kwa wengine badala ya kujisimamia mwenyewe.

sw: Kwa kuingia kwenye Ideascale na kujiandikisha ili kushiriki

en: By being a veteran proposal assessor in the last two funding rounds
sw: Kwa kuwa mtathmini  wa mapendekezo katika awamu mbili za mwisho za ufadhili

en: By being part of a proposal team
sw: Kwa kuwa sehemu ya timu ya mapendekezo

en: By holding at least 500 ada in your voting wallet
sw: Kwa kumiliki angalau ada 500 kwenye pochi yako ya kupigia kura

en: It is very convenient for frequent use
sw: Ni rahisi sana kwa matumizi ya mara kwa mara

en: It is more secure than other types of wallets
sw: Ni salama zaidi kuliko aina nyingine za pochi

en: It can hold more digital assets than other wallets
sw: Inaweza kushikilia mali nyingi za kidijitali kuliko pochi zingine

en: It requires less setup time than other wallets
sw: Inahitaji muda mdogo wa usanidi kuliko pochi zingine

en: It allows you to earn passive rewards
sw: Inakuruhusu kupata zawadi za kupita kiasi

en: All of the above
sw: Yote ya hapo juu

en: It helps secure the Cardano network
sw: Inasaidia kulinda mtandao wa Cardano

en: It is risk-free
sw: Haina hatari

en: Advertising space on Lido Nation
sw: Nafasi ya matangazo kwenye Lido Nation

en: Educational art
sw: Sanaa ya elimu

en: Categorization of NFTs
sw: Uainishaji wa NFTs

en: Custom receiving address for your wallet
sw: Anwani maalum ya kupokea ADA kwenye pochi lako

en: A unique token with no real-world value
sw: Tokeni ya kipekee isiyo na thamani ya ulimwengu halisi

en: A token that is worthless to everyone except the owner
sw: Tokeni ambayo haina thamani kwa kila mtu isipokuwa mmiliki

en: A token that is only trackable on the blockchain ledger
sw: Tokeni ambayo inaweza kufuatiliwa tu kwenye leja ya blockchain

en: A token that has the same value as another identical token
sw: Tokeni ambayo ina thamani sawa na tokeni nyingine inayofanana
